function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of academic study on the impact of COVID-19 on ASEAN economies","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the effects of COVID-19 on ASEAN economies, leading to potential misinformed policies","Mitigation":"Conducting in-depth academic studies to fill the gap and provide accurate information for scholars and policymakers","Technologies":"Research methodologies, data analysis tools","People":"Scholars, policymakers in ASEAN and other countries","Owner":"Academic institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on SMEs in ASEAN countries","Impact":"Adverse effects on SMEs including financial disruptions and performance instabilities","Mitigation":"Implementing supportive policies and financial guarantees to help SMEs withstand the impact of COVID-19","Technologies":"Financial analysis tools, risk assessment models","People":"SME owners, policymakers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Unpreparedness of SMEs to face disruptions caused by COVID-19","Impact":"Inability of SMEs to cope with the challenges posed by the pandemic, leading to economic vulnerability","Mitigation":"Providing resources and support for SMEs to enhance resilience and adaptability to unpredictable disruptions","Technologies":"Business continuity planning tools, financial management software","People":"SME owners, industry associations","Owner":"Government, industry associations"}]}
